edu.mit.jwi.item
Interface IWord

All Superinterfaces:
IHasID<IWordID>, IHasPartOfSpeech
All Known Implementing Classes:
Word
public interface IWord
extends IHasPartOfSpeech, IHasID<IWordID>

Represents a word (a pair of an IIndexWord and ISynset) in the Wordnet database.

Since:
1.5.0
Version:
1.00, 4/14/06
Author:
Mark A. Finlayson

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAdjectiveMarker()
          Returns the adjective marker of this word, as specified in the Wordnet database.
 IWordID[] getAllRelatedWords()
          Gets all word objects related to this word by pointers in the database.
 java.lang.String getGloss()
          Returns the synset gloss for this word.
 java.lang.String getLemma()
          Returns the root form of this word.
 IWordID[] getRelatedWords(IPointerType type)
          Gets all words related to this word by the specified pointer type.
 ISynsetID getSynsetID()
          Returns the id of the synset uniquely identified with this word.
 IVerbFrame[] getVerbFrames()
          Gets all verb frames associated with this word.
